title: Smoke, Bacon and Booze
description: Smoke, Bacon and Booze is a cookbook like none you've ever read before.Filled with delicious recipes for comfort food created with a culinary twist, this book has been suffused with extra information about each recipe, tips for entertaining, and a guide to choosing the proper cuts of meat. Derek even provides an insider's view of the culinary industry. Best (or worst) of all, it's written in Derek's very unique, sarcastic tone.As the warning on the front cover states, this book is not for those who are easily offended. If you can't take the heat, stay out of the kitchen!
author: Derek Lankinen
